Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.oath.soft

Interface SoftGemaltoOathSettings

public interface SoftGemaltoOathSettings
An interface representing the mutable Standard Gemalto OATH options.
Since:
4.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    setMaximumChallengeQuestionLength(int maxChallengeQuestionLength)
    Set the maximum challenge question length for a C/R operation.
    void
    setOtpLength(int otpLength)
    Set the OTP length.

  • Method Details

    • setOtpLength

      void setOtpLength(int otpLength)
      Set the OTP length.
      Parameters:
      otpLength - the OTP length. Allowed values are 6 or 8 digits.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the length is not in allowed values set.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setMaximumChallengeQuestionLength

      void setMaximumChallengeQuestionLength(int maxChallengeQuestionLength)
      Set the maximum challenge question length for a C/R operation.

      See GemaltoOathDevice.getOcraEventChallengeResponse(com.gemalto.idp.mobile.authentication.AuthInput, com.gemalto.idp.mobile.core.util.SecureString) and GemaltoOathDevice.getOcraTimeChallengeResponse(com.gemalto.idp.mobile.authentication.AuthInput, com.gemalto.idp.mobile.core.util.SecureString)

      Parameters:
      maxChallengeQuestionLength - the maximum challenge length. Allowed values are 6 or 8 digits.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the length is not in allowed values set.
      Since:
      4.0
